name: 2 Squares
description:
In this puzzle game, you control 2 Squares simultaneously through their different mazes to reach their end goals, attempting to do so in the fewest number of moves possible. Progress through 9 unique levels, and replay any you've already beaten to try to beat your best score and achieve those S ranks!

As you play through the game and unlock new milestones, you get the option to choose from additional square designs to play as - see if you can unlock all of them!

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move the Squares. (hint: pressing directions simultaneously could result in a diagonal move which can be utilised to beat the minimum possible score - definitely a feature and not a bug)

Game Shortcuts: 

-Backspace to undo move

-Delete to restart level

-Escape to return to menu

This game was  made for my A-Level Computer Science coursework using the Godot Engine. Game doesn't look great visually as it was just me working on it, and I am no artist - but it functions which was the most important aspect for me.

I had a great time making this, and it was the main factor in deciding to pursue VGD at University.
